body_html: @vsrikarunyan, it is better to use CUDA Toolkit 7.0, as recommended. You can install an older CUDA Toolkit along with your newer toolkit. Just point TensorFlow "configure" and maybe LD_LIBRARY_PATH to the CUDA 7.0 when you run TensorFlow.
body_text: @vsrikarunyan, it is better to use CUDA Toolkit 7.0, as recommended. You can install an older CUDA Toolkit along with your newer toolkit. Just point TensorFlow "configure" and maybe LD_LIBRARY_PATH to the CUDA 7.0 when you run TensorFlow.
body: @vsrikarunyan, it is better to use CUDA Toolkit 7.0, as recommended. You can install an older CUDA Toolkit along with your newer toolkit. Just point TensorFlow "configure" and maybe LD_LIBRARY_PATH to the CUDA 7.0 when you run TensorFlow.
